column4: if i retrofit my system to an older version of ubuntu with a live CD, will i have the option of keeping my preference/documents ?

certainly not automatically. There are ways to do it if you home partition is separate. But really - best off backing everything up before you start. Then once installed copy back in whatever preference folders and files you  like.
can i just copy the whole /home folder and copy it back into my new installation ^
You can. Make sure you get all the hidden ones that start with a dot as well. Probably not advisable to copy the whole home dir back - rather selectively copy back the relevant application folders
